scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run watch
scripts.clean: rm -rf ProcessWire/site/templates && rm -rf ProcessWire/site/modules && mkdir -p ProcessWire/site/templates && mkdir -p ProcessWire/site/modules
scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently --raw 'npm run build:templates' 'npm run build:modules'
scripts.build:templates: concurrently --raw 'npm run build:templates:js' 'npm run build:templates:css' 'npm run build:templates:assets' 'npm run build:templates:sitefiles'
scripts.build:templates:css: node-sass --output-style compressed -o ProcessWire/site/templates src/templates && postcss -c -r ProcessWire/site/templates/**/*.css
scripts.watch:templates: concurrently --raw 'npm run watch:templates:js' 'npm run watch:templates:css' 'npm run watch:templates:assets' 'npm run watch:templates:sitefiles'
scripts.watch:templates:js: npm run build:templates:js && onchange 'src/templates/**/*.js' -- npm run build:templates:js
scripts.watch:templates:css: npm run build:templates:css && onchange 'src/templates/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:templates:css
scripts.watch:modules: npm run build:modules && onchange 'src/modules/**/*' -- npm run build:modules
scripts.postinstall: if [[ ! -d 'processwire_modules' ]]; then npm run download:pw-modules && npm run unzip:pw-modules; fi
scripts.download:pw-modules: mkdir -p processwire_modules && cd processwire_modules && awk '/]/ {p=0} p; /pwDependencies.{2,3}\[/ {p=1}' ../package.json | tr -d '", ' | xargs curl -LJSs --remote-name-all
